snippet: The Metropolitan Opera Brass performed works by Gabrieli, Mozart and Lehar in a cathedral on Tuesday evening.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by brass players of Metropolitan Opera Orchestra at Cathedral Church of St John the Divine.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera Brass performed works by Gabrieli, Mozart and Lehar in a cathedral on Tuesday evening.

headline.seo: Metropolitan Opera Brass at St. John the Divine
headline.main: Horns Find a Haven in a Sacred Setting
headline.print_headline: Horns Find A Haven In a Sacred Setting
